body_html: Hi @JingHuang81 , I believe they are two distinct issues -- I was training new model from scratch at that time rather than just transfering the parameters. As far as I am concerned, your problem might be related to some differences in implementation or numerical unstablility. I think you might want to compare intermediate results layer by layer(or you can try binary search to locate the causes).

body: Hi @JingHuang81 , I believe they are two distinct issues -- I was training new model from scratch at that time rather than just transfering the parameters. As far as I am concerned, your problem might be related to some differences in implementation or numerical unstablility. I think you might want to  compare intermediate results layer by layer(or you can try binary search to locate the causes).
